text: UX Requirements DocumentPain PointsCurrent user experience suffers from desktop-centric flows, creating difficulties for mobile users.
Slow load times across the platform lead to user frustration and potential abandonment.
Furthermore, the confusing user interface hinders task completion and overall satisfaction.
These issues collectively contribute to a suboptimal user experience, particularly on mobile devices, where users expect intuitive and efficient interactions.

Addressing these pain points is crucial for improving user engagement and achieving business goals.1Mobile-First FlowsTo enhance the mobile user experience, the implementation of mobile-first flows is required.
This includes a streamlined one-tap registration process to minimize friction during onboarding.
Achieving these targets is vital for user satisfaction and retention.1AccessibilityAccessibility requirements are paramount to ensure inclusivity.
Meeting these accessibility standards is essential for creating a product that is usable by everyone.3
